summary:
Bank of America is a huge American bank and financial company, the second-largest in the U.S. and world. It was formed in 1998 when two big banks merged. The bank has a long history, with roots going back to 1784. It offers many services like commercial banking, wealth management, and investment banking. 

Bank of America has lots of branches and ATMs across the U.S. and other countries. It's known for serving the middle class and has faced some legal issues related to mortgages and financial disclosures. The bank is very big, ranking among the top companies globally.
title: Bank of America
